chav1961.purelib.fsys

Interface IFileSystem

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Closeable

    public interface IFileSystem
extends java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Closeable

    This interface describes an abstract file system.

    Implementation of the interface can be non-thread-safe!

    Since:
    0.0.1
    Author:
    Alexander Chernomyrdin aka chav1961

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  IFileSystem.IFileSystemListCallback
      This interface uses as callback for processing directories content (see )!

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
                  throws java.io.IOException

        Get file/directory name for the file system cursor

        Returns:
        file/directory name. Can't be neither null nor empty. Root returns "/" as name
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if any exceptions was thrown

      • getPath

        java.lang.String getPath()
                  throws java.io.IOException

        Get actual path for the file system cursor

        Returns:
        actual path. Can't be neither null nor empty. Root returns "/" as name
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if any exceptions was thrown
